dismissalText.long: c Mosaddek Hossain b Nasum Ahmed
dismissalText.commentary: Shai Hope c Mosaddek Hossain b Nasum Ahmed 18 (45b 1x4 0x6 67m) SR: 40

dismissalComment.html: Good length ball onto the stumps, attempts to slog sweep it over the circle fielder, miscues it high to short mid wicket, Mosaddek settles underneath and collects it with ease. Hope turned his head down the moment he played that shot, finally gave up after stacking too many dot balls.

commentPreTextItems.html: JC: "I think Daryl was talking about Hetmyer not Holder!" Yeah right
Anis: "Only excitement left in this game whether Tamim will get 50 or not"

commentTextItems.html: Fuller length outside off, advances forward and hits it straight down the ground past the bowler to long off fence. Ends the game in style and also picks up his 53rd ODI fifty

commentPostTextItems.html: That's all for now. This is Thilak Ram signing off on behalf of Chandan Duorah and Rashad. Take care and good night.

Tamim Iqbal: At the beginning of the series I told this in one format we are really proud and played really well. And we lost test and T20 series, dressing room wasn't the happiest. Everyone wanted to win. This is really good, there are lot of areas we need to tick boxes. 2023 World Cup probably will be one of the biggest event for all of us, especially four of us who most likely end there and we have to make the bets possible combination and best possible team going forward. Even in the test matches whatever runs I got I was batting well, what wrong I did was I didn't make big. I take it very simple, I just go with the rhythm and see what the situation is, for now it's going well for me. On Nausm, he's brilliant. When Shakib is here, he doesn't get a game, I think he bowled unbelievably, used the conditions very well.

Nicolas Pooran: Tough, tough day, I don't want to talk about it, We didn't show up as a batting group. For sure we need to talk about how we gonna play ODI cricket especially as a batting group and figure it out soon. The wicket gets better as long as the innings go ahead and weren't able to score over 200, it's challenge batting especially after losing the toss. We spoke yesterday the ways to score, you saw the guys sweep and reverse today but it didn't come out. At the moment we are still figuring it out, we are a young group, we are gonna stick together and try our best. On India and New Zealand touring, we definitely need to bat properly, 100%, and put something respectable total on board and again it's a young team we are playing together, the more games we play the more we understand how to go about it and again, stick together and try to bat second. Toss plays a big factor at the moment, whoever wins the toss wins 75% of the games in the Caribbean and we can't make excuses, it's about accepting the challenges and come out keep fighting.
Nasum Ahmed has been adjudged for his match winning bowling figures.
Isam reports this is Bangladesh's biggest win in terms of overs batted in a chase in a full 50-overs overseas ODI

Chasing a moderate total in 50 overs will always go one way unless there's something extraordinary happen or a Stuart Binny thing. Bangladesh tinkered their order and two left handers came in to combat spin and did a decent job and Liton finished the last rites. Target of 108 was chased under 21 overs and the visitors took assailable lead of 2-0 in the series. On the other hand Nic Pooran and his co has a lot to think over their batting and their approach towards spin and were totally outplayed in all three aspects in the series so far. It is Bangladesh's tenth consecutive ODI win over West Indies, dating back to December 2018 and also it is Bangladesh's fifth consecutive bilateral ODI series win - having beaten Sri Lanka, Zimbabwe, Afghanistan and South Africa before this series win.

commentTextItems.html: Full on the pads, clips it to short mid wicket, chance of a run out at the non-striker's end, Motie hurt his hand while collecting the throw
Full onto the stumps, driven straight back to the bowler

commentPreTextItems.html: Daryl: "As a West Indian every time you our cricket is heading in the right direction you watch games like these. Sad. We train a young man to be captain all he did was win under 19 World Cup what did we do drop him for fitness while he played an entire IPL season " Holder was given rest..

commentTextItems.html: Short of a good length on the off stump, rocks back and defends off the back foot
Back to back boundaries! Quicker delivery outside off, rocks back and plays a late cut stroke past the slip fielder and off to the boundary ropes

commentPreTextItems.html: Sumon Charua: "@Rashad: As far I knew, that rule has changed. MCC law 21.7 says it shall be a no ball if the ball bounces more than once or roll along or land outside the pitch area." Yes it should have been a no ball. The umpires may have missed it

commentTextItems.html: Length ball outside off, hit straight to short extra cover
You can't set a field for those! Half-volley outside off, Tamim uses his feet and lashes it through covers past the extra cover fielder.
